metadata.summary: Hybrid Analysis sandbox integration for detailed malware analysis including behavioral and static analysis results
metadata.primary_use_case: Obtain detailed sandbox analysis results for file hashes to identify malware behavior

extracted_apis.description: Get comprehensive analysis overview for SHA256 hash including sandbox results
Search for hash using MD5, SHA1, or SHA256 values

cross_refs.description: Core concepts of API-based lookups and metadata_rules
Both provide malware analysis but with different sandboxing approaches
